list.description: Edi Suardi  (1984) mengungkapkan bahwa seorang pendidik harus memenuhi beberapa persyaratan, yakni : a) Seorang pendidik harus mengetahui tujuan pendidikan. Sudah tentu tujuan akhir pendidikan harus ia sadari benar. Dalam hal itu pendidik harus banyak mempunyai pengetahuan tentang apa yang disebut manusia dewasa, sesuai dengan tempat dan waktu.

news.abstract: The San Francisco Giants are acquiring All-Star DH/infielder Rafael Devers from the Boston Red Sox, the teams confirmed late Sunday. The Red Sox will receive right-hander Jordan Hicks, left-hander Kyle Harrison, outfield/infield prospect James Tibbs, and minor-league right-hander Jose Bello in the deal. news.display_title: Man suspected of shooting Minnesota lawmakers arrested after huge manhunt
news.abstract: A 57-year-old man has been arrested in the US state of Minnesota on suspicion of killing a Democratic state lawmaker and her husband. The arrest on Sunday night was the culmination of a huge two-day manhunt following the deaths of Melissa Hortman, a Minnesota Democrat, and her husband Mark. lists.summary: Meghan Markle shares rare footage of Prince Harry with their 2 kids to celebrate Father’s Day: ‘Our favorite guy’

news.display_title: Meghan Markle Shares Rare Footage of Prince Harry with Their 2 Kids to Celebrate Father’s Day: ‘Our Favorite Guy’
news.abstract: Meghan Markle is showing love for Prince Harry on Father's Day. On June 15, the Duchess of Sussex, 43, shared an Instagram video tribute featuring rare family footage of her husband, 40, with their two kids. Harry and Meghan, who marked their seventh wedding anniversary in May, share son Prince Archie, 6, and daughter Princess Lilibet, 4. “The best,” Meghan captioned her post.
